name: speedtest-tracker
description: Speedtest Tracker is a self-hosted utility that runs scheduled internet speed tests and visualizes results over time with graphs and statistics.
features: Automated speed tests: Runs internet speed tests on configurable schedules.
Historical data: Stores speed test results for long-term trend analysis.
Download and upload: Measures both download and upload speeds.
Ping latency: Records ping times and jitter measurements.
ISP tracking: Monitors performance across different ISPs or connections.
Graphs and charts: Visualizes speed trends over time with interactive charts.
Threshold alerts: Sends notifications when speeds drop below defined thresholds.
Multiple servers: Tests against different Speedtest.net servers.
Export data: Downloads test results as CSV for external analysis.
API access: Triggers tests and retrieves results via REST API.
Mobile responsive: Views results and manages tests from any device.
Comparison tools: Compares current speeds against historical averages.
